links.*: The Lord of the Rings (1979 radio series)

wikitext.*:
'''Gail Chugg''' is an American stage actor. He provided several voices for [[Mind's Eye]]'s two [[1979]] radio series.

==Roles==
* ''[[The Lord of the Rings (1979 radio series)|The Lord of the Rings]]'' - Narrator, [[Gollum]], [[Gimli]] 
* ''[[The Hobbit (1979 radio series)|The Hobbit]]'' - Narrator, Gollum, [[Balin]]
